name: HP Bar
desc: Health bar frame with warm red fill gradient. Semi-transparent dark backing. Clean pixel edges.

name: SP Bar
desc: Skill points bar frame with deep blue fill gradient. Matches HP bar style. Semi-transparent backing.

name: Fragment Counter
desc: Memory fragment counter icon. Small golden crystal with subtle glow, number display area beside it.

name: Vibrancy Indicator
desc: Zone vibrancy gauge. Small arc meter that fills with color from muted to vivid. Amber accent frame.
